A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has more plot holes than any movie I’ve ever seen. Pointless and unbelievable premise\, lack of any real movement forward with the Star Wars saga\, and honestly\, I’m just left with constantly saying\, “why did they do that?” You May enjoy if you are not a Star Wars fan\, if you are a die hard\, I think you will feel that this if far from the best Star Wars since Empire\, like I’ve been reading\, and more like the worst Star Wars since Phantom Menace.
